mapper.select: select distinct * from (select t1.*, t3.meeting_id,t3.theme,t3.name,t3.abbreviation,t3.starttime,t3.endtime,t3.location,t3.ref,t3.detail, if(endtime < now(),0,1) as conference_status from user_article t1 inner join meeting_article t2 on t1.article_id = t2.article_id inner join meetinginfo t3 on t3.meeting_id = t2.meeting_id where t1.user_id = #{userId}) tt

select distinct * from (select t1.*, t3.meeting_id,t3.theme,t3.name,t3.abbreviation,t3.starttime,t3.endtime,t3.location,t3.ref,t3.detail, if(endtime < now(),0,1) as conference_status from user_article t1 inner join meeting_article t2 on t1.article_id = t2.article_id inner join meetinginfo t3 on t3.meeting_id = t2.meeting_id
t1.user_id = #{userId} and
t1.title LIKE "%"#{articleName}"%"
) tt
